title: Store issues
body: I thought over time league would fix itself, but no matter where I am on what interest my store wont load or takes forever. I have to fight to get into store and buy anything and would like kelp as soon as possible. This has been going on since the last patch and I don't know what to do about it. Most of the time it times out and never loads. the only thing that can get it to work is if I restart league over and over or if I play a game then try to get into the store.

replies.body: PS it also takes forever to log in. saying something about not being able to connect to server.

Hi Axam!

Store issues like this are usually due to some misconfigured Internet Explorer settings.  Believe it or not, our store requires settings with IE in order to work properly.

Because of this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Store Issues Knowledge Base Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-).  It should help!

If none of these steps seemed to have resolved your issue and your screen remains forever black, then make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Tech Specialists can help look into it and provide some additional help!
